css-variables.name: --ilw-profile-card--font
css-variables.description: Font for the card content [default: var(--il-font-sans)]

css-variables.name: --ilw-profile-card--heading-color
css-variables.description: Color of the heading in the card [default: var(--il-blue)]

css-variables.name: --ilw-profile-card--text-color
css-variables.description: Color of text in the card [default: var(--ilw-text--color)]

css-variables.name: --ilw-profile-card--heading--font-size
css-variables.description: Size of headings inside the card [default: 1.5em]

css-variables.name: --ilw-profile-card--title--font-size
css-variables.description: Size of the title below the name [default: 1.1em]

css-variables.name: --ilw-profile-card--link
css-variables.description: Color for links inside the card  [default: var(--il-industrial)]

css-variables.name: --ilw-profile-card--link-focus
css-variables.description: Focus and hover color for links inside the card [default: var(--ilw-link--focused-color)]

css-variables.name: --ilw-profile-card--link-visited
css-variables.description: Visited link color for inside the card [default: var(--il-industrial)]

css-variables.name: --ilw-profile-card--border-bottom
css-variables.description: Bottom border for the card [default: 4px solid var(--il-blue)]
